net.alevel.asteroids.engine.graphics

Class Renderer

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.alevel.asteroids.engine.graphics.Renderer

  • public class Renderer
extends Object
    This manages which objects are to be rendered and also manages the uniforms within the shader program

    • Method Detail

      • initShaderProgram

        public void initShaderProgram()
                       throws IllegalStateException
        Loads the shader code and compiles it and links it to OpenGL. The uniform variables (variables used to interface between GLSL shaders and Java)
        Throws:
        IllegalStateException

      • clear

        public void clear()

      • render

        public void render(Window window,
                   Camera camera,
                   List<GameObject> gameObjects)
        Renders all the renderable objects. It applies the world, camera and projection matrices to get the vertices the OpenGL should draw onto the window.
        It uses the GLSL shaders to do this.
        Each time this procedure runs, a new frame is generated
        Parameters:
        window - Reference to the window to draw to
        camera - The client camera
        gameObjects - The objects to render

      • cleanUp

        public void cleanUp()
        Run this on shutdown. It unloads the shader program.
